name: 스쿨라이프
description:
Synopsis


"Where is your memory?"
What does love mean to high school students?
Even if you can't give a philosophical and outrageous answer, it's undeniable that it's a top priority concern for hot-blooded youth in the thick of it.
Who went out with whom, and who broke up again yesterday.
Any classmate will listen when a story like this comes up in class.
Love... Love...
Was it just spending time fooling around with friends?
I had never been in a relationship, and had little interest in it.
but...

Game features


Three heroines
3-4 hour play time
High quality CG
